notes: The key ideas from the sources are not accurately represented.
You could use more of your own words to paraphrase the author's ideas.
Use different types of quotes for different purposes. Short quotes are used to emphasize word choice and improve the flow. Long quotes are used for detailed textual analysis.
Don’t use quotes for everything. You use quotations only when the exact words matter.
Use the correct format for the “work cited” page. Check the library's website for more details.
